nycTheatreExcerpt: The show's real star is the glitzy, all-encompassing set by David Korins. As the action unfolds, stage platforms shift, audience members shuffle, and video projections display live-action crowd shots and historical documents on large screens throughout the auditorium...this rollicking, form-breaking musical party is well worth an RSVP.
